title: I Like Myself!
description: Positively bursting with energy and imagination, this ode to self-esteem encourages kids to appreciate everything about themselvesâ€”inside and out. Messy hair? Beaver breath? So what! This little girl knows that being proud of being you is the most important thing to remember.At once silly and serious, Karen Beaumont's joyous rhyming text and David Catrow's wild illustrations unite in a book that is sassy, soulful, and straight from the heart.
author: Karen Beaumont
